inputs.description: Input MRI image files
inputs.name: Image files

inputs.description: Correlation coefficient threshold will be 1 - 0.01 * #
inputs.name: Percent Correlation Threshold

inputs.description: Correlation coefficient threshold will be #
inputs.name: Coefficient Threshold

inputs.description: Index of image file to use as first in time series; default is 1
inputs.name: First Image Index

inputs.description: Number of images to actually use; default is to use all images
inputs.name: Number of Images

inputs.description: Turn off default normalization of the output activation image
inputs.name: Disable Normalization

inputs.description: Scaling factor to convert the activation output from floats to short ints
inputs.name: Scaling Factor

inputs.description: Filename of a time series to which the image data will be orthogonalized before correlations are computed
inputs.name: Orthogonalization Time Series

inputs.description: Filename of a time series to which the image data is to be correlated
inputs.name: Ideal Time Series

inputs.description: Use polynomials of order 0..# as extra 'orts'; default is 0
inputs.name: Polynomial Order

inputs.description: Filename to save activation magnitudes in
inputs.name: FIM File

inputs.description: Indicates to write correlation output to image file 'fimfile.CORR'
inputs.name: Correlation Output Flag

inputs.description: Filename to save correlation image in
inputs.name: Correlation File

inputs.description: Filename to save contrast-to-noise image in
inputs.name: CNR File

inputs.description: Filename to save standard deviation image in
inputs.name: Standard Deviation File

inputs.description: Image files of the least squares fit coefficients of all the -ort and -polref time series
inputs.name: Least Squares Fit Coefficients File

inputs.description: Filename of the new timeseries of images with the orts and polrefs subtracted out
inputs.name: Subtracted Ortho Reference Time Series

inputs.description: Write outputs in mrilib 'float' format
inputs.name: Floating-Point Output Flag

inputs.description: Output images won't have the +/- 10000 values forced into their corners for scaling purposes
inputs.name: Clean Output Flag

inputs.description: Set to zero regions of low intensity in output correlations, etc.
inputs.name: Clip Low Intensity Output Flag

inputs.description: Quiet operation mode
inputs.name: Quiet Flag

inputs.description: Use the 'dfspace' filter to register the images spatially before filtering.
inputs.name: DF Space Filter Flag

inputs.description: Read image in file 'fname' as the base image for registration
inputs.name: Base Registration Image

output-files.description: Least squares fit coefficients image files
output-files.name: LS Fit Coefficients Files

output-files.description: Subtracted ortho reference time series images
output-files.name: Subtracted References Time Series Files
